AssetBase.Name: I hope I am ready for the test tomorrow. After a long day of studying, all I need is a good nights sleep.

Welcome to The Forest of Many Questions. Here you will be tested though a series of questions. Your goal is to escape through the cabin in the portal. I will do my best to prepare you for Lord Askalot's questions. He will try and prevent you from leaving.
You find yourself in what seems to be an infinite forest.
To perform the addition operator you must add together the operands. EX: 2+4=6
Using the knowledge learned during the tour:
What is the closest planet to earth?
Don't worry! You can try again.
Using the knowledge learned during the tour:
What is the farthest planet from earth?
Don't worry! You can try again.
Using the knowledge learned during the tour:
What is the largest planet in the solar system?
Don't worry! You can try again.
Using the knowledge learned during the tour:
What is the planet closest to the sun?
Don't worry! You can try again.
You did it! You can escape though that cabin. I hope you don't forget what you have learned.
After answering all of Lord Askalot's questions, a cabin seems to have appeared out of nowhere.
That was a ... productive dream. I hope I am ready for the test today.
